title: Open Images V6 Object Detection
description: Large-scale object detection following Open Images V6 (Kuznetsova et al., IJCV 2020). Annotate 600 object classes with bounding boxes, visual relationships, and instance segmentation masks.
citation:
@article{kuznetsova2020open,
    title = "Open Images Dataset V6: A Large-Scale Dataset for Object Detection, Visual Relationship Detection, Instance Segmentation, and More",
    author = "Kuznetsova, Alina  and Rom, Hassan  and Alldrin, Neil  and Uijlings, Jasper  and Krasin, Ivan  and Pont-Tuset, Jordi  and Kamali, Shahab  and Popov, Stefan  and Malloci, Matteo  and Kolesnikov, Alexander  and Duerig, Tom  and Ferrari, Vittorio",
    journal = "International Journal of Computer Vision",
    volume = "128",
    number = "7",
    pages = "1956--1981",
    year = "2020",
    publisher = "Springer",
    url = "https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s11263-020-01316-z"
}
